comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Olive Schultz was a suffragist who drove a cab for the cause.

comment.author: 33472394@N00
comment._content: There is an article on Olive Schultz in the New York Times of October 3, 1913.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
She is third from left in this Bain/LOC group photo of Suffragists -- evidently wearing the same checkered outfit:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3378610975/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca, Dendroica cerulea, and Wystan for providing more information about Olive Schultz. We will update the description.
